### Latest as of Oct 2018
### start initializing - deleting old files ==============
#Remove all CSV files (.csv): rm -rf /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/GBIF_taxa_csv_dwca/*
#Remove multimedia assignments to taxon (.txt): rm -rf /extra/other_files/GBIF_occurrence/multimedia_gbifID/*
